page.title: 19The Wobbly Wheel Pub
page.content:
This is the Public House which sits atop the ridge on the Southwest side of the valley on the A41 Road.
It serves Customers from both Shotteswell and Warmington Villages being positioned midpoint and some .5 miles distance from the centre of both in some isolation.
It's history is interesting because the current Ordnance Survey Map represents it as the "HARE and HOUNDS" a name that was changed many years ago by a previous owner was a Wheelwright and ran his business from there at the same time as being the Publican.
